events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred last night on the highway, requesting to start a claim.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and provided details about the car damage.
An agent specialized in vehicle collision claims was assigned to assist the customer for faster resolution.
Acknowledgment of the auto accident claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and next steps.
Request for relevant documents including the police report, driver's license, and photos of the damaged vehicle was made to the claimant.
The claimant submitted all requested documentation including the police report and multiple photos showing damages sustained to their car.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and statements to verify the details of the collision claim.
Investigation concluded, confirming the claimant was not at fault and the damages reported match the evidence provided.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the damaged vehicle based on assessment results.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed gratitude for the prompt handling of their claim.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager after all conditions were met and documents verified.
The settlement payment was issued to the customer's bank account for the full amount agreed upon.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after payment confirmation and customer satisfaction was noted.
